name: Subrunners
description:
Graffiti is art. However, graffiti as an act of vandalism is a crime.
...That's what they used to say, right?
I don't know how long we've been stuck down here. The tunnels keep changing and these trains never stop.  All we have are these cans of paint.
...Well, time to get going.

SPACE to jump, S to slide.
Jump while sliding to go drop through.

Made by William Whittington for the second Goblin Bunker Game Jam, with music by Dear Synthia. https://dearsynthia.bandcamp.com/
